name: Get Out (itch) (K_39)
description:
You can't control your movements, but you can shoot to defend yourself and get out.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made in 48h for the GMTK's Game Jame 2020.

This is my first time participating in a jam (maybe I should have started with a little one ?) and I'm happy of finishing it in time, even there is only 3 levels.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Used to make this game : 

- for the game code : pygame, pyinstaller and SublimeText

- for the art : Pixel Studio and ImageMagick

- for the music / sfx : Sfxr,  Bosca Ceoil and SuperSound
